mapper.select: SELECT img.img_real_name FROM img_detail imgDetail JOIN img ON imgDetail.img_num = img.img_num WHERE imgDetail.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_tel = #{user_tel}, user_age = #{user_age}, user_email = #{user_email}, user_prefer_type1 = #{user_prefer_type1}, user_prefer_type2 = #{user_prefer_type2}, user_prefer_type3 = #{user_prefer_type3}, user_prefer_loc1 = #{user_prefer_loc1}, user_prefer_loc2 = #{user_prefer_loc2}, user_prefer_loc3 = #{user_prefer_loc3} WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_num, i.inquiry_title, i.inquiry_content, i.inquiry_process, i.user_id, i.tour_num, ir.inquiry_review_content, i.inquiry_regdate FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN inquiry_review ir ON i.inquiry_num = ir.inquiry_num WHERE i.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY i.inquiry_num DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
